allow:
Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from backend.core.world import World
w = World.load\(''worlds/martian_saga.json''\)
print\(w\)
for e in w.entities.values\(\):
    indent = ''    '' * \(1 if e.parent_id else 0\)
    parent = w.get\(e.parent_id\) if e.parent_id else None
    if parent:
        gp = w.get\(parent.parent_id\) if parent.parent_id else None
        if gp:
            indent = ''        ''
    print\(f''{indent}[{e.type.value:6}] {e.id:20} {e.name}''\)
")
